Summary: Bright object with mulit colored lights and a triangular or wedge shaped object below it.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Windfall
There were no other sightings in Windfall on or around January 2nd 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsShe was in Windfall, looking west which would put the object at approx just south of S.R. 26 and west of U.S. 31 in Kokomo, IN The time was 10:45 P.M. Weather was clear and cool. She observed a LARGE, Bright object with what appeared to be multi-colored lights radiating ffrom it. Directly above it was more lights in a "wedge" or "triangular" shape. She also observed several orange-ish balls of light that seemed to move all over the sky. She said they were doing strange, unnatural movements that no flares or planes could do. They also darted all around the larger object. The large light moved up a little higher, then came back down. She said it was pretty low in the sky. There was no sound. She observed this object for approx 5 minutes before she arrived at her destination.
